sections.text: Rice’s MGA trains future global leaders in diplomacy, development, and governance, combining policy education with practical training.

items: Core in international politics and economics
Electives in security, development, energy, or environment
Policy workshops with Rice’s Baker Institute
sections.text: The MGA blends classroom study with policy workshops, applied capstones, and electives in global issue areas.

items: English proficiency if applicable; GRE/GMAT not required
sections.text: Applicants must provide transcripts, essays, recommendations, and English proficiency scores if non-native; GRE/GMAT not required.
Graduates work in diplomacy, government, NGOs, international development, and global corporations.
